content.question: The ideas expressed through the image reveal that in 1901, which of the following was most true of the United States?

choices.label: Theories of survival of the fittest had been widely rejected by the public.
Efforts to spread democracy overseas had been largely peaceful.
Interventionism had become a more prevalent feature of foreign policy.
Women were encouraged to join the armed forces.

content.answer: Interventionism had become a more prevalent feature of foreign policy.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
